name: The Fox, the Star, and the Mountain
name_original: The Fox, the Star, and the Mountain
description:
Sometimes stars fall to Earth, and they need a little help getting back home!

Play as Stella the Artica Fox as she travels through the North Woods and up a Mountian to help return a fallen star back to the heavens!

-----

How to Play:

Use "Arrow Keys" to move

Use "C" to Jump

Interact with objects by walking into them.

This game was made for the "Secret Santa Game Jam 2021". This gift was created for redpenguiin. This game was created in RPG Maker MV and plays as a simple Platformer.
